subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gaël Monfils beat Richard Gasquet, 6-4, 7-5, 7-5, to reach the United States Open quarterfinals. Roger Federer also advanced, defeating Jürgen Melzer, 6-3, 7-6 (4), 6-3.
snippet: Gaël Monfils beat Richard Gasquet, 6-4, 7-5, 7-5, to reach the United States Open quarterfinals. Roger Federer also advanced, defeating Jürgen Melzer, 6-3, 7-6 (4), 6-3.
